sentences.english: We have been having trouble with that lock. I will call a locksmith right away.
sentences.chinese: 那个锁头有些问题，我会马上给锁匠打电话。

sentences.english: If I had only known, I would have been a locksmith.
sentences.chinese: 早知如此，我宁愿做个锁匠。

sentences.english: Zapa is a locksmith in a quiet and little town lost somewhere in the province of Buenos Aires.
sentences.chinese: 扎巴是布宜诺斯艾利斯一个偏远小镇上的一名锁匠。

sentences.english: The Central Intelligence Agency is seeking locksmiths.
sentences.chinese: 中央情报局招聘开锁匠。

sentences.english: Zhang confessed that and open collusion locksmith, made from burglary, theft 8.
sentences.chinese: 张某交待了和开锁匠串通，制造的8起入室盗窃案。

sentences.english: The Magna Carta of the Argentine Locksmiths' Union prohibits us from doing any work at that address.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷锁匠工会基本章程禁止我们在该地址作业。

sentences.english: Are there any locksmiths near here?
Many locksmiths choose to make some of their tools themselves.
sentences.chinese: 许多锁匠选择使他们自己的一些工具。

sentences.english: This program will show you techniques used by professional Locksmiths to open different types of locks.
sentences.chinese: 这是锁匠的职业技术教程，跟素质和道德有什么关系？

sentences.english: I was a half hour late to work and had to go to the locksmith for a third time.
sentences.chinese: 我上班已经迟到半小时，却还得去找锁匠第三次。

sentences.english: May I borrow your phone to call a locksmith?
sentences.chinese: 我可以借用你的电话打个电话给锁匠吗？

definition: to pick a lock/to force a lock
locked in (with the door locked from the outside)
to break in/to force a door
plumbing and electrical work/tradesman who does both plumbing and electrical work
